official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage under the Medicare Program of all oral anticancer drugs.
short_title: Access to Cancer Therapies Act of 2001

summary.text: Access to Cancer Therapies Act of 2001 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to extend Medicare coverage to all oral drugs prescribed for use as an anticancer agent for a medically accepted indication.

titles.title: Access to Cancer Therapies Act of 2001
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage under the Medicare Program of all oral anticancer drugs.
